alert.note: Alert for Central Interior; Middle Tanana Valley; Upper Koyukuk Valley; Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 06 at 2:43PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...Strong Winds Over Interior Highway Summits This Weekend... Summits of the Steese, Elliot and Dalton Highways can expect strong winds, blowing snow and cold wind chills starting Friday night and continuing into Sunday. Northeast winds gusting to 40 mph, blowing snow with low visibility, heavy drifting snow, and wind chills of 40 to 60 below can be expected over summits through the weekend. Similar conditions area expected over the White Mountains and on hills near Chena Hot Springs. Areas south of the Chatanika River, and from Two Rivers west, including Fairbanks, are not expected to be as windy.
